hero.title: Huza nabo utazi.
hero.subtitle: Vugana ukirekura.
hero.description: Urubuga rwa mbere rwa Rwanda rwo kuganira kuri videwo nabo utazi. Hura ubuzima bushya bwo guhuza abantu hamwe n'ikoranabuhanga rigezweho n'umutekano utagereranywa.

auth.signIn: Injira muri konti yawe ya Tugwemo
auth.createAccount: Kora konti yawe kugira ngo utangire guhuza

group.title: Kuganira kuri videwo mu itsinda
group.description: Kora icyumba cyihariye gifite kode ihariye maze uhamagare abagenzi bawe kugeza kuri 6 kugira ngo muganire kuri videwo mu ibanga. Nta kwiyandikisha bisabwa - soma kode gusa!
group.createDesc: Kora kode y'icyumba ihariye maze utangire kuganira mu itsinda
group.joinDesc: Injiza kode y'icyumba kugira ngo uinjire mu kuganira mu itsinda gisanzweho
group.shareCodeHint: Sangiza iyi kode n'abagenzi bawe kugira ngo binjire mu cyumba cyawe

createModal.title: Kora icyumba cy'itsinda
createModal.codePlaceholder: Injiza kode y'icyumba cyangwa ukore imwe
createModal.hint: Sangiza iyi kode n'abagenzi bawe kugira ngo binjire mu cyumba cyawe

group.authRequired: Ubufasha bwo kwemeza busabwa. Injira kugira ngo ukore ibyumba by'itsinda.
group.authRequiredJoin: Ubufasha bwo kwemeza busabwa. Injira kugira ngo uinjire mu byumba by'itsinda.

terms.title: Amategeko n'amabwiriza
terms.subtitle: Soma aya mategeko neza mbere yo gukoresha serivisi zacu
terms.acceptanceText: Uko uko winjira no gukoresha Tugwemo, wemera kandi ugahana gukurikiza amategeko n'amabwiriza y'iri sezerano. Niba utemera gukurikiza ibisabwa haruguru, ntukoreshe iyi serivisi.
terms.licenseText: Uburenganzira bwo gukoresha Tugwemo mu buryo bw'igihe gito bwawe bwite butari ubucuruzi buhawe. Ibi ni uburenganzira bwo gukoresha, si uburenganzira bwo kugurisha, kandi muri ubu burenganzira ntushobora:
licenseItems: gukoresha ibikoresho mu buryo ubwo ari ubucuruzi cyangwa uburyo bwo kwerekana rusange
kugerageza gusenyura cyangwa gusubiramo kode y'ikoranabuhanga iri muri Tugwemo
gukuramo ibimenyetso by'uburenganzira bwo kwandika cyangwa ibindi bikoresho
terms.responsibilitiesText: Abakoresha bafite inshingano zo kubungabunga ibanga ry'ibanga ryabo n'ijambo ry'ibanga. Wemera kwakira inshingano ku bikorwa byose bibaho muri konti yawe cyangwa ijambo ry'ibanga. Ugomba kutumenyesha ako kanya ibikorwa byose bitari ibyemewe by'ukoresha konti yawe cyangwa ikindi cyangwa ikibazo cy'umutekano.
terms.privacyText: Ibanga ryawe ni ingenzi kuri twe. Soma politiki yacu y'ibanga, itangwa n'ukoresha Tugwemo, kugira ngo umenye imyitwarire yacu ku bijyanye no gukusanya no gukoresha amakuru yawe bwite.
prohibitedItems: Mu buryo ubwo ari ubutari bwo gukurikiza amategeko cyangwa gusaba abandi gukora ibikorwa bitari ibyemewe
Guhonyora amategeko mpuzamahanga, y'igihugu, y'intara, cyangwa y'akarere
Guhonyora uburenganzira bwacu bwo kwandika cyangwa uburenganzira bwo kwandika bw'abandi
Guhohotera, gukoresha nabi, guhubuka, gukomeretsa, guhubuka, guhubuka, guhubuka, guhubuka, cyangwa gutandukanya
Kohereza amakuru atari yo cyangwa ayobya
terms.availabilityText: Dufite uburenganzira bwo gukuramo cyangwa guhindura serivisi yacu, n'ibikoresho byose duha kuri Tugwemo, mu buryo bwacu bwite butitaweho. Ntidufite inshingano niba impamvu yose umurengera cyangwa igice cyose cy'iyi serivisi kitaboneka igihe icyo ari cyo cyose cyangwa igihe runaka.
terms.terminationText: Dushobora kurangiza cyangwa guhagarika konti yawe no guhagarika uburyo bwo kwinjira muri serivisi ako kanya, atitaweho ibimenyetso byambere cyangwa inshingano, mu buryo bwacu bwite, impamvu yose itari iy'imbibi, harimo ariko bitari iby'imbibi, guhonyora amategeko.
terms.contactUs: Niba ufite ibibazo ku iyi mategeko n'amabwiriza, ntutinye kutwandikira.

privacy.title: Politiki y'ibanga
privacy.subtitle: Ibanga ryawe n'umutekano w'amakuru ni ingenzi kuri twe
privacy.collectionText: Dukura amakuru utanga muri twe mu buryo butaziguye, nko gukora konti, gukoresha serivisi zacu, cyangwa kutwandikira ubufasha. Ibi bishobora kugira amazina yawe, aderesi ya emeyili, n'amakuru yindi wemera gutanga.
privacy.collectionHighlightText: Amakuru bwite, amakuru yo gukoresha, amakuru y'igikoresho, n'ibimenyetso byo guhuza kugira ngo duhe serivisi kandi tuyongere.
usageItems: Duhe, tugire, kandi tuyongere serivisi zacu
Tugire ibicuruzwa kandi tohereze amakuru ahuzwa
Tohereze amakuru y'ikoranabuhanga, amakuru mashya, amakuru y'umutekano, n'amakuru y'ubufasha
Tuguhuze ku bijyanye n'ibicuruzwa, serivisi, ibyifuzo, n'ibikorwa
privacy.sharingText: Ntitugurisha, ntitugurisha, cyangwa ntitugurisha amakuru yawe bwite ku bandi bantu atitaweho uburenganzira bwawe, uretse nk'uko bisobanurwa muri iyi politiki. Dushobora gusangiza amakuru yawe mu bihe bikurikira:
sharingItems: N'abatanga serivisi badufasha gutwara urubuga rwacu
Iyo bisabwa n'amategeko cyangwa kurinda uburenganzira bwacu
Mu bijyanye no gucuruza cyangwa kugura ubucuruzi
privacy.securityText: Dushyira mu bikorwa ingamba z'umutekano zikwiye kugira ngo turinde amakuru yawe bwite ku kwinjira bitari ibyemewe, guhindura, gusohora, cyangwa kurimbuka. Ariko, uburyo ubwo ari ubwo bwo kohereza kuri interineti ntibuba 100% umutekano.
privacy.securityHighlightText: Kwandika, seriveri zirinzwe, igenzura ry'umutekano buri gihe, n'ibimenyetso byo kugenzura kugira ngo turinde amakuru yawe.
privacy.cookiesText: Dukoresha cookies n'ikoranabuhanga rihwanye kugira ngo tuyongere uburambe bwawe kuri urubuga rwacu. Ushobora kugenzura igenamiterere rya cookies muri mushakashi wawe.
privacy.thirdPartyText: Serivisi yacu ishobora kugira amahuza ajya ku zindi za rubuga cyangwa serivisi zitari izacu. Ntidufite inshingano ku myitwarire y'ibanga ry'abo bandi.
privacy.childrenText: Serivisi yacu ntabwo yagenewe abana bari munsi y'imyaka 13. Ntidukura amakuru bwite ku bana bari munsi y'imyaka 13 mu buryo tubizi. Niba tubona ko twakuye ayo makuru, tuzafata ingamba zo kuyasiba.
privacy.changesText: Dushobora kuvugurura iyi politiki y'ibanga rimwe na rimwe. Tuzakumenyesha ibihinduka binyuze mu gutangaza politiki nshya kuri iyi paji no kuvugurura itariki ya "Yasobanuwe bwa nyuma".
privacy.contactUs: Niba ufite ibibazo ku iyi politiki y'ibanga cyangwa imyitwarire yacu y'amakuru, twandikire.

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.subtitle: Twishimiye kukubona. Twandikire ubutumwa kandi tuzagusubiza vuba bishoboka.
contact.subject: Ingingo
